May 3, 2014 D European Championships
European Championships 10 Set Test and Own Choice European Championships european-championships
Muckle Flugga
Perth Concert Hall, Perth, Perth & Kinross, Scotland, UK Set work, Friday 2nd May, adjudicators Buchegger, Winter, Segers; own choice Saturday 3rd May, adjudicators Christensen, Roberts, Kolly.
Best Soloist: Katrina Marzella baritone (Black Dyke)
Dec. 16, 2013, 5:02 p.m. May 4, 2014, 7:33 a.m.
